panels.description: The percent used of JVM buffer pool memory.

targets.expr: 100 * (sum by (job,opensearch_cluster,node, bufferpool) (opensearch_jvm_bufferpool_used_bytes{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",node=~"$node"})) / clamp_min((sum by (job, bufferpool, cluster) (opensearch_jvm_bufferpool_total_capacity_bytes{opensearch_cluster!="",job=~"$job",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",node=~"$node"})),1)

panels.title: JVM buffer pool usage
